snippet: Savvy play by the veteran guards Jason Kidd, Pablo Prigioni and Raymond Felton has steered the Knicks in the right direction through two games.
lead_paragraph: Savvy play by the veteran guards Jason Kidd, Pablo Prigioni and Raymond Felton has steered the Knicks in the right direction through two games.

headline.seo: Knicks Again Combine Passing With Firepower
